unnormalised: Crop insurance is vital for farmers in states like Maharashtra facing unpredictable monsoons. Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana (PMFBY) aims to protect against yield loss. Transparency in claim settlement needs improvement, especially regarding losses on small holdings (~1000 sq ft). Dr. Patil's research highlighted delays. Ensure timely disbursement of Rs. 5000 compensation for rain-affected crops. Need better awareness drives in villages like Ambegaon.
